column5: I just had an email from a friend which shows the raising of Basa in Vietnam. I have never tried this fish and it certainly won't be making my shopping list anytime soon! This is an eye opener.
This has been posted at least a half dozen times here, and it never gets more appetizing, that's for sure.
Glad I only eat what I catch... At least I have a better idea where it comes from and what it may be exposed to...   ...
Add to this., Talapia and shrimp raised in Asia.  I challenge you to find shrimp in any supermarket that is wild caught and not farmed in Asia.  Don't eat this stuff more than a few time a year.
If you're really concerned about your body being a test pit for a plethora of toxins, you should consider tending a good garden and getting good with a rifle.
